body:
You can use this form to ask for personal information held by: 

* HM Prison Service
* Probation Service
* Legal Aid Agency 
* Office of the Public Guardian
* HM Courts and Tribunals Service

If you're after personal information from elsewhere in the Ministry of Justice please apply ......

To ask for personal information from other areas of MoJ, visit <link>.

## Before you start ##

Completing this online form should take around 5 minutes. The more specific you can be, the quicker it is to find your information.

You will need to provide the following:

* personal details â€” name, date of birth
* type of information you require
* where information may have been collected, for example which court or prison you dealt with, and when

We cannot process your request without:

* photo ID, such as a passport or driving licence
* proof of address, such as a bank statement or utility bill from the last 3 months
* a signed letter of consent dated from the last 6 months (if you are a solicitor asking for someone else)

If you are requesting information on behalf of someone but you are not a solicitor, you must provide photo ID and proof of address for that person plus a signed letter of consent dated from the last 6 months.

## After making your request ##

You should receive a response within 30 days. We will contact you if we need more details to answer your request.

components.html: Asking for an update during this time may mean it takes longer to get the information you want.

## Answering your request ##

If we hold any information about you, you will receive:
* a description of the information held
* an explanation why it is held 
* details of who it could be given to
* a copy of the information in a readable form

If your request reveals details about another person that information will not be shared. 

We will only send information once, so please be careful about how you store anything you receive.

extraComponents.html:
## Other ways to ask for personal information ##

[You can also send a request by email or post](https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-justice/about/personal-information-charter).

heading: Request personal information
